lore.block.aether_unity.ambrosium_campfi: A campfire made of Ambrosium. You can use this to cook meat, or as a signal or light source!
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_block: The Aether's native moss species. This can be grown with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_carpet: A thin, blanket-like layer of Flutemoss. This is produced when growing Flutemoss with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.golden_oak_leaf_: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
lore.block.aether_unity.short_aether_gra: Blades of the Aether's grass. It feels slightly cool to the touch.
lore.block.aether_unity.skyroot_leaf_pil: A pile of Skyroot Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
